name: taxon-property
title: Taxon Property
description: A flexible, generic way to assign arbitrary property values to a taxon. It can be used to share species profiles, traits, descriptions and any other dynamic information about a taxon. Every property value can optionally be referenced and ordered.

fields.name: taxonID
fields.title: taxonID
fields.description: The subject taxon the property is about.

fields.name: sourceID
fields.title: sourceID
fields.description: Optional identifier for the source this record came from as listed in the metadata.yaml

fields.name: property
fields.title: property
fields.description: The required name of the property the value is assigned to. For example a text label like "Biology" or "Illustration", a Plinian core term or some Wikidata P value like P2974.

fields.name: value
fields.title: value
fields.description: A required free text value for the given property. If markup is needed Markdown is preferred.

fields.name: ordinal
fields.title: ordinal
fields.description: An integer to specify an optional custom sort order for property values sharing the same taxonID in the dataset.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.title: referenceID
fields.description: An optional reference where this property value was documented or who asserted it.

fields.name: page
fields.title: page
fields.description: The exact single page number where the property value was published in the linked reference. If the value spans multiple pages, the first page should be given.

fields.name: modified
fields.title: modified
fields.description: UTC timestamp in ISO format to represent the time the record was last modified.

fields.name: modifiedBy
fields.title: modifiedBy
fields.description: Author identifier indicating the person who has last modified the record.
